statements: SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills LIKE '%Python%';
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE experience_years < 3 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, skills FROM employee_profiles WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, experience_years FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills LIKE '%Java%' AND training_records IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM employee_profiles WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills LIKE '%Java%' OR skills LIKE '%Python%' ORDER BY experience_years ASC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, email_address FROM employee_profiles WHERE experience_years > 3 AND skills LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT full_name, email_address, experience_years FROM employee_profiles WHERE training_records IS NULL OR training_records = '' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, email_address, skills, experience_years FROM employee_profiles WHERE skills IS NOT NULL AND experience_years BETWEEN 2 AND 5 ORDER BY skills ASC, experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT employee_name, employee_skillset FROM EmployeeProfiles ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_experience FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_experience > 1;
SELECT AVG(employee_experience) as avg_experience FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT training_name, date_completed FROM TrainingRecords WHERE date_completed > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_completed ASC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_skillset FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_experience > 5
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_skillset LIKE '%Java%' AND employee_experience > 3 ORDER BY employee_name ASC
SELECT training_name, date_completed FROM TrainingRecords WHERE date_completed >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_completed DESC
SELECT employee_name, employee_experience FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_skillset = 'Python' ORDER BY employee_experience DESC
SELECT training_name, training_description FROM TrainingRecords WHERE training_name LIKE '%SQL%'
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT employee_name, experience_years FROM employees WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Programming'];
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE team_lead = 101;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, experience_years FROM employees ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS num_projects FROM departments JOIN projects ON departments.department_id = projects.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT project_name, team_lead FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT employee_name, skills FROM employees WHERE skills @> ARRAY['Python', 'SQL'];
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, experience FROM employees WHERE experience > 5;
SELECT id, name, skills FROM employees WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT title, name FROM positions JOIN employees ON positions.id = employees.id;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, experience FROM employees WHERE experience > 5;
SELECT e.name, p.title FROM employees e INNER JOIN employee_positions ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id INNER JOIN positions p ON ep.position_id = p.id;
SELECT e.name, e.skills, ep.start_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN employee_positions ep ON e.id = ep.employee_id;
SELECT d.name AS department, COUNT(ep.position_id) AS num_positions FROM departments d JOIN positions p ON d.id = p.department_id JOIN employee_positions ep ON p.id = ep.position_id GROUP BY d.name;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, skills FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE skills LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM Experience ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, skills FROM EmployeeProfiles WHERE skills LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT * FROM Experience INNER JOIN EmployeeProfiles ON Experience.employee_id = EmployeeProfiles.employee_id WHERE Experience.job_title = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT employee_id, training_title, training_date, completion_status FROM TrainingRecords WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY training_date DESC;
